original_text:
I became the laughingstock of all my people;
    they mock me in song all day long.
korean_text: 나는 내 모든 백성에게 조롱거리 곧 종일토록 그들의 노랫거리가 되었도다

sentences.original_text: I became the laughingstock of all my people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 모든 백성의 조롱거리가 되었고

sentences.original_text: they mock me in song all day long
